divs: sighting detailsi was traveling north on highway 1 @ 3 miles south of solon, ia at approximately 9:00 pm and i saw three red lights in the sky. i noticed the lights because i was watching dark clouds to the north and the lights weren't blinking. i thought it very odd that three planes would be so close together. as i drove i noted that i was getting closer to the lights and they weren't moving. the lights seemed to be much lower in the sky as i got closer. as i drove under the lights they were approximately the size of a dinner plate in the sky and appeared to be a golden\orange color. there was a white van parked on the side of the road and the driver was out looking at the lights, but i did not stop. i thought it was extremely strange that i drove closer and then under the lights and they didn't seem to be moving at all, other than being much lower in the sky than i expected. i did not notice any light beams coming from the ground or any vehicles. i lost sight of the lights when i rounded a curve. the lights were gone when i drove south on the same route approximately 30 minutes later with my husband. we did not see any lights in any direction on our way south to iowa city.
Summary: Three red lights in sky turned golden/orange when I drove under them
trends: There have been no other sightings in Solon
